snippet: A federal panel and other groups recommend that the Pap test, which screens for cervical cancer and for decades was a yearly ritual for many women, should be done only every third year.
abstract: A federal panel and other groups recommend that the Pap test, which screens for cervical cancer and for decades was a yearly ritual for many women, should be done only every third year.

headline.main: New Guidelines Advise Less Frequent Pap Smears
headline.print_headline: New Pap Smear Guidelines Advise Less Frequent Tests
